title: Mexico
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Mexico - Social life and customs
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Family - Social aspects
description: Episode of Series "Families of the world". Meet 13 Year-old Alejandro Prado Guerrero and her family as we learn about her life in Pueble, the fourth largest city in Mexico. We spend a week with the family as they go about their daily lives, from school to shopping to going to church. Students will learn about the country and culture of Mexico, and how both modern and traditional methods of living exist in the daily lives of its people. Suitable for Mid-Upper Primary level students. Teacher's guide included.
related_objects: Series; S01347; Families of the world; Active; 1986
